name: Society for Social Action and Mobilisation for Better Human Amenities and Awareness (SAMBHAW)
briefDescription: Since 2012, we have been working to improve the quality of lives of women and children in the areas of skilling and education through CSR activities and project under PMKVY. Our initiatives across 18 districts was focused on capacity building of workforce and educate them so that they can thrive for betterment of their lifestyle which will lead it for the betterment of Society. 3416 trainee out of 4110  from  Bhilwara  and nearby villages were trained in industrial sewing and are now working at various stitching industries  in textile  industry of Gujrat and Rajasthan.434 trainee out of 1080 from all across the Rajasthan were trained in Beauty& Wellness, Field Technician Networking and Storage and Retail Courses under PMKVY 2.0.
